about_the_game:
The Soundtrack contains all tracks from Yozora Rhapsody as mp3 file.

01. Challenge (1:50)
02. Deep in Space (1:50)
03. Forever Love (2:32)
04. Good Morning Sunshine (1:08)
05. Late at Night (1:56)
06. Opening (1:20)
07. Ritual of the Old Ones (1:01)
08. Sexy Time (1:31)
09. Smoothy Day (2:47)
10. Sorry Me (1:41)
11. The Beach (2:21)
12. Tropical Island (2:11)
12. Yozora Rhapsody (2:00)
